text_block_list.text: Finally, a precious day off. I had planned to use this day to improve myself.
I thought that if I wanted to support Daiichi Ruby, who is always striving to be the best, I also need to improve myself.
I meet Daiichi Ruby at a large bookstore I visited. I carry a large number of books that I have bought in a variety of genres.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ……I see, for the sake of improvement?
I thought she would be appalled by the number of book, but that didn't happen. It look like she is looking for a book too.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Today, I came here to purchase the catalogue of the current art exhibition.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: It was already sold out in the exhibition hall where it is being held, It's this one…
Daiichi Ruby showed me a thick book filled with detailed explanations along with photographs of the paintings.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: When I visit the exhibition, I always ask for it.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: It is a great way to quickly access expert opinions, the explanations and supplements are substantial, it's very informative.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san also seems to have purchased art history books. If you are interested, you may find these catalogs helpful―

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: …It's not my intention to point it out but, I see that you have already purchased quite a few books.
It's true that I already pick up a lot of thing. The expense will be considerable. But this is also for study ……
choice_data_list: Because I want to try my best to match you
Because I want to try my best to match you

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: is that so.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: …Trainer-san, do you have plan after this? If you have time, I would like to bring you somewhere.
I was allowed to ride in Daiichi Ruby's car, after that we arrived at an art museum where an exhibition of the catalog I had purchased is being held.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: I was planning to visit this art exhibition today. Catalogs are nothing more than a stepping stone for understanding the works.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: There are lessons you can only learn from seeing the real thing. Now, let's go.
Daiichi Ruby guided me through the museum. She seemed to have done a lot of research before, her explanations are very thorough.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ―All of the works on display today are by the same artist, who hails from Tohoku.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: The realistic brushwork and ethereal expression are the essence of his work, it is highly regarded for its profound and subtle style.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Also in the exhibit over there―
Even after leaving the exhibition I can still feel the excitement. Thanks to Daiichi Ruby's explanation, I feel I was able to appreciate the paintings more deeply.
Although I felt tired because we spent so much time on each point, but I was able to spend a day filled with a sense of fulfillment.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Is that so?
choice_data_list: And I'm glad I found out who your favorite painter is.
And I'm glad I found out who your favorite painter is.

text_block_list.text: Daiichi Ruby lives on a minute-by-minute schedule. She too spend her free time free time enjoying things she likes.
I am more than happy to know that. That's what I was thinking―

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: No, I'm not particularly like this painter.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: I heard that the guest of honor at the next gathering was from the same hometown as today's artist, so I went to see it.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: I hope it will be a good conversation piece. Because there are people who have a deep knowledge of art.
Daiichi Ruby was enthusiastically taking notes during the viewing. That's why I thought that this is her favorite artist―
choice_data_list: All of that for just a single meeting?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: I believe that meticulous preparation in advance is the best form of courtesy.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Besides, this kind of experience will be my own food for thought. I want to make full use of the opportunity to learn.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: The guideline for deciding actions is whether it is necessary or not, not likes or dislikes. I only feel that it is "necessary" to visit here today.
Daiichi Ruby said that and stretched her back. I understood that this integrity of her is the core of who she was.
Still, at that time――
It was in front of a painting of a starry sky. It was unusual that she didn't say anything, just looked straight at it.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ……Scorpion's Fire……
Only that painting seemed to show her something other than family obligations. When I asked her she would not give me an answer.
After returning home. I looked up the painting that she was looking at in the catalogue. The title is "Antares" - the heart of Scorpius, the star of summer.
Among the stars that glitter white, there is a single solitary star that shines bright red. It feel similar to her… that's what I thought.
